import React ,{useState, Fragment} from 'react'; import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form'; import {Col,Button,Form,Label,Input,FormGroup,InputGroup,InputGroupAddon,InputGroupText} from 'reactstrap'; import {FirstName,LastName,Username,State,City,Zip,SubmitForm} from '../../../../../../../constant'; import "./styles.css"; const PageOneMainHelper = (props) => { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }} = useForm(); const [validateClass , setValidateClass] = useState(false); const onSubmit = (e, data) => { e.preventDefault(); if (data !== '') { alert('You submitted the form and stuff!'); } else { errors.showMessages(); } }; return (
{errors.firstName && 'First name is required'}
{"Looks good!"}
{errors.lastName && 'Last name is required'}
{"Looks good!"}
{"@"} {errors.lastName && 'User name is required'}
{"Please choose a username."}
{errors.city && 'Please provide a valid city'}
{"Please provide a valid city."}
{errors.state && 'Please provide a valid state.'}
{"Please provide a valid state."}
{errors.zip && 'Please provide a valid zip.'}
{"Please provide a valid zip."}
); } export default PageOneMainHelper;
